tweets.text:
The proof: 1 year post-restoration a previously barren, silt-smothered and fish-impassable section of the River Test now produces buckets of juvenile wild trout!
#ChalkStream
#WildRiversForWildFish #WillTravelForGravel

A @WessexRivers @WildTroutTrust and @EnvAgencySE partnership https://t.co/fnvXXeIHu0

Flooding is causing some travel disruption in the #NorthWest this afternoonüíß.

Check travel updates before you travel and plan an alternative route if necessary. 

üöóüö≤üöÑüöé https://t.co/uxjDQ5M2H4

tweets.text: Been looking at @EnvAgencyNW river level graphs for river Yarrow nr #Croston today. Shows role of #CrostonDam. Dam filled; levels through village reduced & record level below the village. Credit to the modellers; designers; builders; forecasters! https://t.co/uwer0aXpgj

The @EnvAgencySE have declared a FLOOD ALERT for the River Thames from Hurley to Cookham "flooding of low lying roads and farmland is expected this evening, 06/10/2020, especially in the Marlow area https://t.co/qF3Vhlb9EG

The Flood storage Basin in #Croston, #Lancashire has been operated today to take pressure off the nearby River Yarrow following the recent heavy rainfall. 

You can check the latest river levels near where you live online üëâhttps://t.co/spz1PwxKAq https://t.co/5brfE3TgA5

Our Partners @EnvAgencyYNE protecting a further 30,000 homes and businesses across the #Humber.
What amazing work building #resilience for the future. https://t.co/25nfnsX7do

@Tebs17 @UllswaterCic @EnvAgencyNW Sorry, been off Twitter for a week. The @EnvAgencyNW has several #NFM projects in the Kent catchment that are funded as part of the @DefraGovUK NFM pilots.  You can find out more from @TheFloodHub https://t.co/3jccTIkOMQ https://t.co/1xRgzCjewt

We have a brand new, shiny White-clawed #Crayfish Ark Site in the @SouthWestPeak 

Huge thanks to all the volunteers & project partners.

We translocated 537 white-claws yesterday in less than ideal conditions!!! https://t.co/m1mffUHWQt

Confirmation untreated sewage still being discharged from Chesham Sewage Treatment Works, going on since 8.30pm Friday 2nd Oct, expect this will continue today Sunday 4th Oct and probably into Monday. If you see discoloured water report to @EnvAgency 
 Hotline 0800807060

I talked to @BenGoldsmith about his Somerset rewilding project, @EnvAgency enforcement and what @BorisJohnson  and @michaelgove think about bringing back long lost species... 
https://t.co/l2yUiGJzN1 https://t.co/uaaiBP27xv

@AndynBrown16 @EnvAgencyNW Having witnessed first hand responding to flooding in Croston (esp. Boxing Day 2015) it‚Äôs great to see this scheme doing it‚Äôs thing Andy üëçüòÄ

Ruislip Flood Liaison Action Group earlier - good discussion with Wallington Close residents and @EnvAgency @Thames21 @Hillingdon over flood risk mitigation measures and for property resilience. https://t.co/AJ2cb5Vm3P

Somerset, are you prepared for winter? Join us and our partners between Tuesday 20th- Thursday 22nd October for a free virtual event with training, videos and presentations- everyone is welcome! @somersetprepare https://t.co/PVwiwYfgxj

Our field teams and contractors have started a series of special training sessions to boost their skills and prepare for winter. A total of five sessions will include the deployment of mobile pumps, temporary defences and sandbags during major flood incidents. https://t.co/y72scdK8qK

@EnvAgency ‚Äî call the floodline, 0345 988 1188, to report a flood or if your property is at risk of flooding from a reservoir, river or coastal water.

Upstream flow gauge back online nowüëçWell done @EnvAgencySE. Currently 220 m3/sec at #teddington weir. River is flowing quickly, fair amount of debris coming downstream too (tree stumps etc, not just bottles), probably washed out of gardens as the level rises. #twickenham

Heavy rain = sewage over flow usual postcode NR15 2JR @AnglianWater @SNorfolkCouncil @EnvAgencyAnglia https://t.co/nSNumRcush

Day 56

The next environmental ticking time bomb will be toxic #PFAS and #PFOS chemicals polluting UK waters.

A regulatory vacuum.

When this breaks, remember you were told. 

 @EnvAgency @DefraWater @GeorgeMonbiot @carolecadwalla @BBCNews @Channel4News @jonsnowC4 @EnvAgencyYNE

tweets.text:
@MarthaCrockatt @Westoxongreens @Earthwatch_Eur @thameswater We have lots of plans!

Firstly, the data and findings will be shared with the @EnvAgency, who will use it to inform their work. Keep an eye on our webpage - we will soon be releasing some maps showing how the two datasets work together, thanks to our friends at @UK_CEH...

A view from the bottom of the new river channel being excavated at the Victoria Ground in #StokeonTrent. The tree roots embedded into the banks and river bed will provide shelter for fish and habitat niches for aquatic wildlife. @EnvAgencyMids @SoTCityCouncil @theriverstrust https://t.co/8xYXSFZP3b

Yes yes yes a new CENTA blog post! 

@Shtacy_Phillips, one of the winners of @2020Centa, explained her research through Lego stop motion animation. For her placement at the @EnvAgency she has done something similar but with a focus on e-DNA #mustread #MustWatch #LEGO https://t.co/PI7ehcqcKb
